name: mats-testing
description: Boilerplate project to run WebdriverIO tests with Cucumber

scripts.test: npm run clean-logs && env NODE_OPTIONS="--max-old-space-size=16384" npx wdio run wdio.conf.js
scripts.test:headless: npm run clean-logs && env NODE_OPTIONS="--max-old-space-size=16384" HEADLESS="true" npx wdio run wdio.conf.js
scripts.test:debug: npm run clean-logs && env NODE_OPTIONS="--max-old-space-size=16384" DEBUG="true" npx wdio run wdio.conf.js
scripts.test:debug:headless: npm run clean-logs && env NODE_OPTIONS="--max-old-space-size=16384" DEBUG="true" HEADLESS="true" npx wdio run wdio.conf.js
